targets.query: SELECT mean("load1") AS "1 min", mean("load5") AS "5 min", mean("load15") AS "15 min" FROM "system" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s) fill(linear)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("io_time"), 10s) FROM "diskio" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s) fill(linear)

list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY = "host"
